name: GrandLocomon
description: GranLocomon is a mechanical Digimon that bears a strong resemblance to a train. Its body is covered in blue, chrome, and yellow metal. It wears a metal mask on its face with spikes protruding from the tip and bridge of the nose. Its wheels are arranged in a 4-6-4 configuration, save for its spiked front wheel, which it holds in place with its hands.
